award_labels.label: Honorary Membership in Prestigious Academies
award_labels.awarding_organization: Russian Academy of Sciences, USSR Academy of Sciences, Russian Academy of Education, Tajik Academy of Sciences
award_labels.reasoning: Honorary membership in multiple prestigious national academies signifies significant contributions to science and education.

award_labels.label: Order of Honour (Russia)
award_labels.reasoning: A high state award in Russia, recognizing outstanding achievements and service to the nation.

award_labels.label: Order of Prince Yaroslav the Wise
award_labels.reasoning: A prestigious Ukrainian state award, recognizing outstanding contributions to the nation and society.

award_labels.label: USSR State Prize
award_labels.reasoning: A major national award in the USSR, recognizing exceptional achievements in science, technology, literature, and arts.

award_labels.label: State Prize of the Russian Federation
award_labels.reasoning: A prestigious national award in Russia, recognizing outstanding contributions in various fields.

award_labels.label: Honorary Doctorate from University of Niš
award_labels.reasoning: An honorary degree from a recognized university, signifying significant academic or professional achievements.
